snippet: Security officers at Churchill Downs called the Louisville police just before 5 a.m. after discovering the body of a Guatemalan man in a barn occupied by a longtime horse trainer.
abstract: Churchill Downs track worker Adan F Perez, a Guatemalan immigrant, is found dead in a barn on the racetrack grounds only hours after the Kentucky Derby; his death is being investigated as a homicide.

byline.original: By JOE DRAPE and CHANNING JOSEPH
byline.contributor: Joe Drape reported from Louisville, and Channing Joseph from New York. Sabrina Tavernise contributed reporting from Washington.

lead_paragraph: Security officers at Churchill Downs called the Louisville police just before 5 a.m. after discovering the body of a Guatemalan man in a barn occupied by a longtime horse trainer.

headline.seo: Body Found at Churchill Downs After Kentucky Derby
headline.main: Body Is Found at Racetrack After the Derby
headline.print_headline: Body Is Found At Racetrack After the Derby
